img_above_text:
# Baw-Lang Lang

Baw-Lang-Lang is one of the six frog bosses you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. The fifth of the frogs, Baw-Lang-Lang can only be discovered once you've taken down the Five Element Carts and gained access to Bishui Cave.

## How to Find Baw-Lang-Lang
img_below_text:
When you've beaten the Rusty-Gold Cart approach the frozen-over entrance and break through to head inside.

This doorway will take you to the chapter's secret area called the Bishui Cave. We'd recommend completing this before you finish up the chapter. But there's one last miniboss to fight before you teleport to the secret area.

img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text introduces Baw-Lang-Lang, the fifth frog boss in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It explains that players can find this boss after defeating the Five Element Carts and gaining access to Bishui Cave.

Image Summary:  
The image appears to depict the entrance to Bishui Cave, with a frozen, cracked doorway highlighted by a red arrow. A character, likely the player, stands in the foreground holding a staff, facing the doorway. A red-circled area in the background suggests the presence of an enemy or object of interest near the cave entrance. The image serves as a visual guide to help players locate the cave and prepare for the next steps.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text provides instructions for proceeding after defeating the Rusty-Gold Cart. It advises breaking through the frozen doorway to access Bishui Cave, a secret area in the chapter. Players are encouraged to complete this area before finishing the chapter, but they will encounter a miniboss before teleporting to the secret area.
